name: Sanctuary
description: You ward a creature within range. Until the spell ends, any creature that targets the warded creature with an attack or a harmful spell must first make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the attacker must choose a new target or lose the attack or spell. This spell does not protect the warded creature from area effects. The spell ends if the warded creature makes an attack, casts a spell that affects an enemy, or deals damage to another creature.
